Description: Being an employer within the meaning of the Health & Safety at Work etc. Act 1974 (‘the Act’) did fail to discharge the duty imposed on them by Regulation 11(1) of the Provision and Use of Work Equipment Regulations 1998, in that they failed to ensure so far as is reasonably practicable, the safety of persons in their employment, in that that they did not prevent access to the dangerous moving parts from the front of the machine, in particular access to the milling block, as was necessary for the safe use of the Flex Line Edge Banding machine (machine number 0-200-26-4042) located at their site at Omega Boulevard Capitol Park, Thorne, Doncaster, South Yorkshire, DN8 5TX , whereby they are guilty of an offence contrary to Section 33(1)(c) of the Act
Address: Omega Boulevard/Omega PLCOmega BoulevardCapitol ParkDONCASTERSouth YorkshireDN8 5TXEngland
